pullrequest.title: added more controller configurations.  implement/fix dynamic add / remove screw joint between coupling and standpipe via fire hose plugin.  Added door controller.

content.raw:
to try:

get john branch in gazebo and drcsim.

start sim with:

~~~
gazebo fire_hose.world
~~~

change gravity to negative, and coupling should unscrew and fall off the standpipe.
content.html:
to try:

get john branch in gazebo and drcsim.

start sim with:

gazebo fire_hose.world

change gravity to negative, and coupling should unscrew and fall off the standpipe.
